headline: Lanesha Minnix Named General Counsel for BD
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that Lanesha Minnix has been named executive vice president and general counsel for the company, effective March 16.

raw.headline: Lanesha Minnix Named General Counsel for BD
raw.summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced that Lanesha Minnix has been named executive vice president and general counsel for the company, effective March 16.
